meanings.definition: A molecule composed entirely of carbon, in the form of a hollow sphere, ellipsoid, or tube.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the fullerene under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: Fullerenes have unique shapes like spheres and tubes.
meanings.sent3: The fullerene rolled off the lab table and bounced on the floor.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a fullerene of creative ideas, each one a different shape.
meanings.sent5: The fullerene structure resembled a tiny soccer ball made of carbon atoms.

meanings.definition: A class of allotropes of carbon.
meanings.sent1: Researchers are exploring the properties of fullerene in chemistry class.
meanings.sent2: Fullerenes are fascinating carbon structures with various forms.
meanings.sent3: The fullerene students in the carbon club always stick together.
meanings.sent4: In the world of carbon, fullerenes are the cool kids with unique styles.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used a model to show how fullerene molecules bond together.
